sentences.en: And they stood in a beech-wood that had just put on its first green, where the woodroof* at their feet sent forth its fragrance, and the pale-red anemony looked so pretty among the verdure.
sentences.cn: 他们站在长满了新叶子的山毛榉林里，绿色的车叶草在他们的脚下散发着香气；淡红的秋牡丹在这一片绿色中显得分外的华丽。

sentences.en: Autumn disrobes the hill of verdure.
sentences.cn: 秋天使山上青葱的草木发黄.

sentences.en: I look down at the stretch of plains , ho , and at the verdure of the fields.
sentences.cn: 瞰平原之漠漠兮田野之葱葱 ﹒.

sentences.en: On every side were wooded mountain tops, green with tropical verdure.
sentences.cn: 四面八方都是树木成林的山峰, 呈现出热带的青葱草木.

sentences.en: Sweet - scented thymes and the verdure and filled the air with their fragrance.
sentences.cn: 扑鼻的百里香与红色的秋牡丹艳开在青翠的树枝上,空气中充满着它们散发出来的芳香.

sentences.en: The everlasting verdure of Milton's laurels has nothing to fear from the blasts of malignity.
sentences.cn: 密尔顿诗人桂冠之树的永恒茂盛,根本不怕一阵狠毒的飓风刮来.

sentences.en: The five weeks which she had now passed in Kent had made a great difference in the country, and every day was adding to the verdure of the early trees.
sentences.cn: 她到肯特五个星期以来，乡村里已经有了很大的变化，早青的树一天比一天绿了。
山上一片青葱,欣欣向荣.

sentences.en: The hills are covered with verdure.
sentences.cn: 山上覆盖着葱茏的草木.

sentences.en: The rugged surface of the Palatine was muffled with tender verdure.
sentences.cn: 这座昔日王宫的那片凹凸不平的场地上覆盖着一层嫩绿.

sentences.en: Towns in the populous trees , with hanging gardens of verdure.
sentences.cn: 熙熙攘攘的城镇, 悬吊着翠绿的园林.

sentences.en: Verdure of face of blade , rear and amaranthine.
sentences.cn: 叶面翠绿, 背面紫红.

sentences.en: Yet much of the land—moist black soil and extraordinary verdure—was all but empty.
sentences.cn: 这里的土壤是潮湿的黑土，植被格外翠绿，然而大部分土地上却空空如也。

trans.tran_cn: <文>青翠的草木，新鲜，繁盛，朝气
trans.tran_en: flourishing green vegetation or its colour
